messages.subject: Early Bird Deadline Approaching for Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering
messages.msgSnippet: The Early Bird Deadline to Register for the UWG (Unschoolers Waterpark Gathering) is only 29 days away!   Register by Feb. 15 and receive $45 in Kalahari
messages.messageBody:
The Early Bird Deadline to Register for the
UWG

(Unschoolers
Waterpark Gathering)

is only 29 days
away!

 

Register by Feb. 15 and receive $45 in Kalahari gift
cards!
 
Rooms start at only $85 / night
PLUS, your waterpark wristbands are included
with your hotel room reservation!  
 
 The 2011 UWG takes place May 16 -
20 
at the Kalahari Indoor Waterpark Resort in Sandusky,OH -  
  America 's largest indoor waterpark! 

Check it out at:
http://www.kalahari resorts.com/
oh/waterparks/!
 
 *~*~*~*~*~*~ *~*~*~*
 This year's speaking line-up includes
some of the most outspoken voices in the unschooling community:
 
 Pat Farenga – Keynote Opening Speaker

James
Marcus Bach - author of "Secrets of a Buccaneer
Scholar"
Lisa Cottrell-Bentley - author of Wright on time
Book Series
Zoe Bentley - 14 yr.
old unschooler and NASA's No Boundaries Competition 2nd
place winner

Dayna Martin, author of "Radical
Unschooling; A Revolution Has Begun"

 and many more! (
see our UWG website for full listing of speakers, events and other details)
 
 *~*~*~*~*~*~ *~*~*~*
Hurry Now to:   www.ugo.event.com/
to register
before the Feb.15 Early Bird Deadline!
 
 And be sure to
join our Yahoo group at :
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/

to begin connecting
with others and get all the
latest information.
 

 
~ Carol Reinhard
    UWG
Coordinator
 
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UWG/

http://ugoevent.com/

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
